name: Waking Nightmare
description: All cards are on the table and the Borg Queen has stepped out of the shadows. She has summoned all those recently assimilated to launch an attack and has remanded those who still resist to Unimatrix Zero. It's time to put an end to this nightmare!
rules:
-- Unique Borg, Dominion, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using La Sirena Borg Queen, Bashir, M.Hansen, Detmer or Borg crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: La Sirena Borg Queen, Detmer, Bashir, M.Hansen, or Borg
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Tendi
featured_crew.flavor: Battling her conscience while serving as CMO in a drill, Tendi might be more dangerous for her Klingon patient than anything he had planned.

featured_crew.name: Hansen
featured_crew.flavor: An exobiologist who was assimilated along with his family during the capture of USS Raven.

rewards.name: Dominion Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Dominion faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tendi
rewards.flavor: Battling her conscience while serving as CMO in a drill, Tendi might be more dangerous for her Klingon patient than anything he had planned.

goals.flavor: Defend against a new drone assault with the Dominion.

potential_rewards.name: Dominion Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Dominion faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Stop the Borg Queen from the shadows with Section 31.

potential_rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons

goals.flavor: Take down Unimatrix Zero from within with the Borg.

potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Residents of the Alpha Quadrant, I see you have been enjoying my new Unimatrix Zero and the fruits it has borne. Surely drones new and old alike must be pleased with the paradise I have gifted them. Now, join our ranks. Crush those who would destroy what I have built."

"Captain, there isn't much time. She's exercising control over those who have been assimilated by Unimatrix Zero, gearing up for an attack. And those who haven't been assimilated completely are being drawn back in until they are. You have to put a stop to all of this!"

"Residents of the Alpha Quadrant, I see you have been enjoying my new Unimatrix Zero and the fruits it has borne. Surely drones new and old alike must be pleased with the paradise I have gifted them. Now, join our ranks. Crush those who would destroy what I have built."

"Captain, there isn't much time. She's exercising control over those who have been assimilated by Unimatrix Zero, gearing up for an attack. And those who haven't been assimilated completely are being drawn back in until they are. You have to put a stop to all of this!"

"Residents of the Alpha Quadrant, I see you have been enjoying my new Unimatrix Zero and the fruits it has borne. Surely drones new and old alike must be pleased with the paradise I have gifted them. Now, join our ranks. Crush those who would destroy what I have built."

"Captain, there isn't much time. She's exercising control over those who have been assimilated by Unimatrix Zero, gearing up for an attack. And those who haven't been assimilated completely are being drawn back in until they are. You have to put a stop to all of this!"

"Residents of the Alpha Quadrant, I see you have been enjoying my new Unimatrix Zero and the fruits it has borne. Surely drones new and old alike must be pleased with the paradise I have gifted them. Now, join our ranks. Crush those who would destroy what I have built."

"Captain, there isn't much time. She's exercising control over those who have been assimilated by Unimatrix Zero, gearing up for an attack. And those who haven't been assimilated completely are being drawn back in until they are. You have to put a stop to all of this!"
